final_question: Yusra Shah and Sana Pir are reading the same book . Yesterday , Yusra Shah read 10 pages while Sana Pir read 13 pages . Today , Yusra Shah read 5 more than as many pages as what Sana Pir read yesterday , while Sana Pir was not able to read any pages today . How many more pages did Yusra Shah read more than Sana Pir ?

Yusra Shah is making Buttering Doudo for his family for dinner . He has a pot with enough Buttering Doudo to fill four adult's bowls or eight eight child's bowls . He is an adult and will be eating with his wife and their two children . If everyone eats one bowl at a meal , how many times will each child be able to have a bowl of Buttering Doudo for dinner from the leftover Buttering Doudo ?
The Saddar Bazaar Peshawar is selling notebooks for pkr 1 . 50 each and a ballpen at pkr 0 . 5 each . Malala bought five notebooks and a ballpen . How much did he spend in all ?

khudabaksh has been making face masks . She can make 4 small masks with 2 yards of material and 3 large masks with 2 . 25 yards of material . How much material would she need to make 20 small and 8 large masks for her class ?
There are 9 jeeto pakistan movies , Salaar has seen each one in the theatre three times . She has spent pkr 216 seeing these movies . What is the average price she paid per ticket ?
Mazaar sleeps for 10 hours a night . He works 2 hours less than he sleeps and he walks his dog for an hour each day . How much free time does Mazaar have left in his day ?
Mazaar has a box with 7 blue shoe boxes and 9 red shoe boxes . If he uses 3 blue shoeboxes and 1 / 3 red of his shoeboxes to go fishing , how many red and blue shoe boxes are left in Mazaar 's box ?
Huzaifa Rajpoot has 9 books and Faisal Sethi had twice the number of Huzaifa Rajpoot ’ s books , but he lost 2 of them . How many books does Faisal Sethi currently have ?
Sarvaich has 30 marbles . He gives 1 / 5 of them to Allahditta and gives 10 to Tanzila Soomro . How many marbles are left for Sarvaich ?
Rabia Raza 's age eight years ago was two times Ayesha Lakhani 's age four years ago . If Rabia Raza 's age is 60 now , how old will Ayesha Lakhani be in 8 years ?
Bahloor 's farm is 200 acres , and Nawaz Shareef 's farm is 100 acres more than twice that . How many acres do the two farms have , together ?

Palwasha works for a manufacturing company in the packaging division . He gets paid pkr 0 . 20 for every package he completes . If he completes 10 less than 50 packages per hour , how much money , in Pakistani Rupee , does he earn in a typical eight - hour workday ?

Ayesha Lakhani drinks a bottle of water every half hour . A normal sudoku puzzle takes him 45 minutes . An extreme sudoku takes 4 times that long . How many bottles of water does he drink in that time ?

Guljana threw bologna at his balloons . He threw two pieces of bologna at each red balloon and three pieces of bologna at each yellow balloon . If Guljana threw 58 pieces of bologna at a bundle of red and yellow balloons , and twenty of the balloons were red , then how many of the balloons in the bundle were yellow ?
Rashid Minhas car needs a tune - up every 1000 miles . He drives 100 miles a day for a 30 day month . How many tune - ups does he need in that time ?

Palwasha works for 5 hours on Tuesday . On Wednesday he works twice the time he works on Tuesday . On Thursday he works 2 hours less than the time he works on Wednesday . How many hours does Palwasha work in all these three days ?

Khadim hussain and Ghulam rasool were given the same amount of allowance by their mosi . The two girls decided to combine their allowance to surprise their nand on his birthday . They bought a Sindhi Kadhi which costs pkr 11 . They also bought 1 dozen balloons which were sold for pkr 0 . 5 for 2 balloons . The remaining money was used to buy 2 tubs of chicken thikka for pkr 7 each . How much did Khadim hussain and Ghulam rasool 's mosi give each one of them ?
Bano Qudsiya bought 3 apples , 5 bananas and 6 oranges at the Raja Bazaar . Yusra Shah ate 2 pieces of the fruit . How many pieces are left ?

There are 6 students playing shatranj and twice that number playing Teerandaji . There are 16 boys and 22 girls playing butthan . If each student only participates in one group , how many students are there in total ?

To raise Pakistani Rupee for their class fund , each of the 30 students from one class sold lollipops that cost pkr 0 . 8 per lollypop . On average , each student sold 10 lollipops . If they bought the lollipops for pkr 0 . 5 each , how much Pakistani Rupee was the class able to raise from the profit of selling lollipops ?

Adil Kareem loves taking care of animals . He has 3 markhor . He has 3 times as many lion as markhor . He has 2 fewer parrot than lion . He has a fish tank with three times the number of buffalo as parrot . He also has a collection of peacock that's 1 / 3 the number of buffalo he has . How many pets does Adil Kareem have ?
A NAMKEEN TIKKA has 24 slices . If Gul Panra can eat 2 slices a day while Momna Janjua can eat twice as much , how many days will the NAMKEEN TIKKA last ?
Qiyaas has been collecting shells since she turned 5 years old , every month she collects one shell . By her 10th birthday , how many shells will Qiyaas have collected ?

Nabila Mangi is brewing cups of tea for her friends . She has 27 cups , and she divides these into 3 rows . In each row , she creates equal amounts of darjeeling tea and lemongrass tea tea cups . She then uses the remaining cups to brew a total of 15 cups of cardamom tea . How many cups of lemongrass tea tea are in each row ?

A buffalo moves very slowly , and only eats when he is up in his tree . For a meal of DUM PUKHT , it takes the sloth 4 hours to make the trip down the tree , pick up DUM PUKHT , and climb back up into his tree . Assuming he picks the same number of DUM PUKHT on each trip , what is the least number of DUM PUKHT he can pick up per trip down to the ground if he wants to collect 24 DUM PUKHT in 8 hours ?

There are 10000 gallons of water in a pool . Using a water pump , Syed Masood Sadiqque and his mamu fill a tank with half the amount of water in the pool . They use water from the tank to water their vegetable garden . If the tank is emptied at a rate of 500 gallons of water per day , how many gallons of water will be remaining in the tank after 6 days ?

Guljana loves going to the movies and every month his parents give him pkr 150 to spend at the movies . Tickets for Fridays and Saturdays cost pkr 10 cost . Tickets for any other day cost {currency sign} 7 pkr. {food items} costs pkr 8 pkr {food items} cost pkr 2 pkr. It is the last day of the month and it's a Friday . He wants to make sure he gets a {food items} and Kashmiri Muji Gaad that DefaultEntity . How many movies can he see if he already saw 5 movies on a Friday or Saturday , 8 movies on other days , had 2 tubs of {food items} , Kashmiri Muji Gaad four {food items} that pkr ?

Nazia Hassan bakes 200 Dal makhani and 300 dal . A normal Dal makhani has 600 calories and a normal dal has 450 calories . If one portion has 1 / 3rd of the calories of a normal version , how many calories do the food items he baked have ?

Gulzar Alam hand - picks Junebugs off of her plants every summer . On Monday , she removed 39 Junebugs . On both Tuesday and Wednesday , she removed twice as many Junebugs as she did on Monday . Thursday she removed 48 and on Friday she removed 57 . What is the average number of Junebugs that she removes per day ?
A bus travels 60 miles per hour for 5 hours . A car travels 30 miles per hour for 8 hours . How much farther did the bus go than the car , in miles ?

When Faisal Sethi watches her mumani , she gets out a variety of toys for him . The bag of building blocks has 31 blocks in it . The bin of stuffed animals has 8 stuffed animals inside . The tower of stacking rings has 9 multicolored rings on it . Faisal Sethi recently bought a tube of bouncy balls , bringing her total number of toys for her mumani up to 62 . How many bouncy balls came in the tube ?

The combined age of khudayar , Huzaifa Rajpoot and Faisal Kapadia is 100 years old . Find the age of khudayar knowing that Huzaifa Rajpoot is 10 years older than Momna Janjua and that khudayar ’ s age is equal to the sum of Huzaifa Rajpoot and Momna Janjua 's age .

Ghulam Fatima invited 4 of her friends over for a water balloon fight in the backyard . At the start of the game , Ghulam Fatima gave each of her friends 2 water balloons . She had one water balloon for herself . Then her susar came out and gave each person 3 more balloons . How many total balloons did the girls have ?

A charity group decides to do a ashura . 10 people donate 5 boxes of stuff each . They also have 10 boxes of stuff already . They can fit 2 boxes worth of stuff per table . If they already own 15 tables , how many new tables do they need ?

Bahloor and Gul Chahat are having a watermelon seed spitting contest . Whoever spits their seeds the most total distance wins . They each get one watermelon . Bahloor 's has 40 seeds and she spits each one 10 feet . Gul Chahat 's has 35 she spits each one 12 feet . What is the average total distance spat ?

Binda Ramazan is trying to decide between buying the pressure cooker , which makes 60 widgets an hour , and the hand blender , which makes 45 widgets an hour . Each widget sells for pkr 6 . How much more money will Binda Ramazan make from the pressure cooker vs . the hand blender if it runs 24 hours a day for a month with 30 days ?

A hotel in the Lahore charges 1000 Pakistani Rupee for a 12 - hour stay or 1600 Pakistani Rupee for a 24 - hour stay . After 12 hours , visitors have the option to add 70 Pakistani Rupee for every additional hour . Gul wali daad arrives at 5 pm at the hotel and wants to leave at 10 am the next morning . He decides to go with the option of adding on 70 Pakistani Rupee for every hour after the 12 - hour mark instead of paying for 24 hours . How much money would Gul wali daad save ?

Palwasha is feeding his livestock hay . Each chicken needs 5 pounds , and each goat needs 3 pounds less than twice the amount each chicken needs . If there are 15 buffalo and 12 goat , how many pounds of hay does Palwasha need ?

Allahditta earned 50 Pakistani Rupee an hour and worked 6 hours in the week . If he spends 50 Pakistani Rupee on gas and wants to deposit 100 Pakistani Rupee in the bank , how many 25 Pakistani Rupee pens can he buy after he buys 5 pencils that cost 10 Pakistani Rupee each ?

Sohrab and his brother take turns spelling out the longest letter words they know and counting the number of the letters in those words . After ten rounds , Sohrab has spelled out 20 words with 15 letters each . If Sohrab 's brother has spelled words with a total count of letters 50 more than Sohrab , calculate the total number of letters in the words they've spelled after the ten rounds .

For the Shandur polo festival , children are to perform mass drills in the presence of the President of the country . They stand 8 in a row and there are 7 rows each for 5 different Schools . How many children can there be in the drill ?

There are 29 pupils in a class . The teacher has 9 coupons ; each coupon can be redeemed for 100 bottles of apple juice . The teacher gives each student 2 bottles of apple juice to drink for lunch . After redeeming all her coupons and giving each student their apple juice lunch , how many bottles of apple juice does the teacher have for herself ?

Yusra Shah 's Nestlé Pakistan charges pkr 40 to visit a house to make a repair , plus pkr 35 per hour , or part thereof , for labor , plus parts . One job took 2 . 25 hours and used pkr 60 in parts . How much did Yusra Shah charge ?
Moosa Sandhu gets 10 new CDs . Each CD cost pkr 15 . He gets them for 40 % off . He decides he doesn't like 5 of them and sells them for 40 . How much money was he out ?

Huzaifa Rajpoot is planning to sell her root crops . She has 6 yams which can be sold at pkr 1 . 5 each , 10 sweet potatoes that cost pkr 2 each , and 4 carrots which cost pkr 1 . 25 each . If she sells everything , how much will she earn ?

Gullu Butt loves to go swimming and has to swim across a 20 - mile lake . He can swim at a pace of 2 miles per hour . He swims 60 % of the distance . After that , he stops on an island and rests for half as long as the swimming time . He then finishes the remaining distance while going half the speed . How long did it take him to get across the lake ?
A bakery has 40 less than seven times as many loaves of bread as Kinaat Noor had last Friday . If Kinaat Noor had seventy loaves of bread last Friday , how many loaves of bread does the bakery have ?

Momna Janjua teacher gives stickers for reward . She was given 15 stickers for participating in class , but she lost 7 stickers during playtime . However , her teacher gave her another 5 stickers for helping her classmates . How many stickers does she have at the end ?

Momna Janjua markets various newspapers to get a commission on each copy sold . He gets a 10 % commission on each copy of the Daily Hilal Pakistan and an 8 % commission on each of the Daily Qaumi Bandhan . How much commission will he earn in total from the sales of 6 copies of the Daily Hilal Pakistan and 10 copies of Daily Qaumi Bandhan if each costs pkr 5 and pkr 15 respectively ?
Wasif Ali Wasif is half of Kinaat Noor ’ s age and five years younger than Nabiha Tariq . Nabiha Tariq is 26 . How old is Kinaat Noor ?

Sana Pir , Gul Chahat , and Ghulam rasool each contributed to their team's 45 points . Sana Pir scored the most points and it was 20 more than Gul Chahat scored and 10 more points than Ghulam rasool scored . How many points did Gul Chahat score ?

The book is printed on paper that , when stacked , is 100 pages to the inch . Each paper is printed on both sides , with one page of the book printed on each side . How many pages are in the book , if it is 1 . 5 inches thick ?
Shahzeb Shah can staple 30 reports every 15 minutes . If he was stapling reports from 8 : 00 AM until 11 : 00 PM , how many reports did he staple altogether ?

Bano Qudsiya sleepwalks , to monitor her sleeping hours , she installs a camera in her room . Bano Qudsiya usually goes to sleep at 10 p . m . and wakes up at 6 a . m . She is a sleepwalker . One day , after reviewing the cameras , she finds that she woke up that day and was sleepwalking from 2 : 15 to 2 : 38 am . Also , that day she woke up 5 minutes earlier than usual to go to the bathroom . How many minutes did she sleep on her bed that day ?
Dil Murad has 2 / 3 as many Shahi paneer as Sai bhaji . If he has two dozen cups and gifts Guljana 6 Shahi paneer for his birthday , calculate the total number of utensils Dil Murad has remaining .

A hospital has a capacity of 1000 beds with 1 / 5 occupied . Due to the coronavirus outbreak , 50 patients are admitted into the hospital each day . Calculate the total number of unoccupied beds in the hospital after 2 weeks .

Sohrab sends sixteen emails a day . Seven are work emails , and two - thirds of the remainder are to emails . One - third of the other emails are to her khalu . How many emails a day does she send to her khalu ?
Faisal Kapadia 's father is five times as old as Gul Panra . Gul Panra is currently three times as old as Khalid Sulehri . If Khalid Sulehri is 3 years old , how old is Faisal Kapadia 's father ?

Wasif Ali Wasif attended a concert and reported that the audience was 48 in number . However , Wasi Shah went to the same concert and said that Wasif Ali Wasif had made the mistake of overstating the number of people in attendance by 20 % . If Wasi Shah was right , how many people really attended the concert ?

Nabiha Tariq brought one bag filled with basketballs to practice and dumped them all out onto the gym floor before practice began . After the practice time was over , he asked Tariq Birohi , Maahekaan , and Momna Janjua to pick up the balls and carry them over to the bag . The three boys picked up and carried all of the balls in one trip . Tariq Birohi carried twice as many balls as Maahekaan , and Maahekaan carried twice as many balls as Momna Janjua . If Maahekaan had picked up and carried 2 balls , what is the total number of balls that the Nabiha Tariq brought to practice ?

A pirate crew is digging for buried treasure on the island marked X on a map . They dug ten holes the first day , thirteen holes the second day , and eight holes the third day . They stopped digging early on the third day to fill in two holes the pirates kept falling in . On the fourth day of digging , they unearthed a treasure chest full of gold , jewels , and an aged hat . The island had four times as many holes by then as it did at the end of the first day . How many holes did the pirates dig on the fourth day before finding the treasure ?

Moosa Sandhu , Rana Sanaullah , and Huzaifa Rajpoot wanted to share Rogan Josh equally but then realized only two people would get an equal amount of Rogan Josh , while the other person would receive 15 more Rogan Josh than the number the others got . If Moosa Sandhu and Rana Sanaullah got 70 Rogan Josh each , how many Rogan Josh were there altogether ?

Taji Khokhar decides to travel to 3 different countries . He has to pay pkr 400 for the supplies he needs , in total . The tickets for travel cost , in total , 50 % more than the supplies . How much does travel cost ?

Arqam , Adnan Narejo , and Safeer Gujjar are trying to catch them all , Pokemon that is . Together they have caught 339 Pokemon . Arqam has caught 5 more than Adnan Narejo , and Adnan Narejo has caught 13 less than 4 times as many as Safeer Gujjar has caught . How many Pokemon has Adnan Narejo caught ?

Akram Rahimoon just started watching a new show . Each episode is 20 minutes long , and there are half as many episodes in total as there are minutes per episode . How many minutes will Akram Rahimoon spend watching the show if he watches every episode ?

A bird decides to leave her summer home in the north and travel to her winter home in the south . To make the journey , the bird leaves her home flying in a southerly direction for 10 hours at a speed of 30 miles per hour . Then , the bird turns direction and flies towards the north for 2 hours are a speed of 18 miles per hour . Finally , the bird changes direction and flies toward the south for 5 hours at a speed of 22 miles per hour before landing at her southern home . What is the distance , in miles , between the bird's northern and the southern homes ?

Nawaz Shareef wanted chicken thikka for her Barsi . She made a batch for herself ; one dozen chicken thikka . At her office , they threw her a party and sent her home with 1 / 2 a dozen chicken thikka . When she arrived home , her friends were there to throw her a surprise party and had 4 dozen chicken thikka waiting . During the party , 1 1 / 2 dozen chicken thikka were eaten . How many individual chicken thikka did Nawaz Shareef have left over from the entire day ?
Gam'shaad is 8 years old . His brother is twice his age . Gam'shaad 's sister is 25 % younger than him . What is the total age of all three of the family members ?

Akram Rahimoon works in the pro shop of a kho-kho resort . He has 12 racquets that need restringing . 3 of them are to be strung with synthetic gut , 5 of them will be strung with polyester string , and 4 of them will be strung with a hybrid set ( half synthetic gut , half polyester string ) . How long will it take Akram Rahimoon to string all of those racquets if it takes him an average of 15 minutes for him to string with synthetic gut , 22 minutes to string with synthetic gut , and 18 minutes for hybrid sets ?
Nawaz Shareef decides to buy new phones for him , his 2 mosi , and his susar . Each phone after the first 2 is half price . If the phone price is pkr 600 how much did he pay for them all ?
Punhal baseball team has 7 more players than Moomal . If Moomal team has 13 players , how many players are there in both teams combined ?
Maahekaan is building a 15 foot long , 10 foot wide , rectangular wooden fence around his garden . He needs 2 wood slats for every foot of fencing he builds . How many wooden slats will he need ?

Sassi bought 12 boxes of oranges at the Safa Gold Mall . She gave her phuppa and her khalu 2 boxes of oranges each . Then she kept 1 / 4 of the oranges and sold the rest . How many oranges did Sassi sell if each box contains 20 oranges ?
Mian Wali has 4 more than half the number of states in the Lahore . What's the total number of states in both countries together ?

Sana Pir wants to buy a Qasida that costs pkr 18 , a Dīpavaṃsa that costs pkr 13 , and a Kamasutra that costs pkr 8 . He has saved pkr 14 from his allowance . If Sana Pir earns pkr 5 per hour , how many hours does he have to work to afford his books ?

Yusra Shah , Dananeer , and Ghulam rasool are going to share 60 cherries . If Ghulam rasool has 30 cherries , and has 10 more than Yusra Shah , how many more cherries does Ghulam rasool have than Dananeer ?

Shabia Cheema is selling Sindhi biryani and Buttering Doudo for a fundraiser . On Saturday , he sold 10 boxes of Sindhi biryani and 4 fewer boxes of Buttering Doudo , than on Sunday . On Sunday , he sold 5 more boxes of Sindhi biryani than on Saturday and 15 boxes of Buttering Doudo . If the Sindhi biryani cost pkr 6 and the Buttering Doudo cost pkr 15 , how much did Shabia Cheema earn for two days ?

Arqam reapplies an ounce of sunscreen every hour she's outside . Her sunscreen comes in 8 - ounce bottles . While on vacation , if she will be outside 4 hours a day over 8 days , how many bottles of sunscreen will she need to pack ?
The red car is 40 % cheaper than the blue car . The price of the blue car is pkr 100 . How much do both cars cost ?
Zohaib Hassan is 19 years old now . When he turns 24 , he will be half the age of his dad but twice as old as his brother . What is the sum of the ages of his dad and his brother now ?

Rabia Raza is collecting different kinds of beads for making bracelets . Her nand gave her 20 metallic beads . Her bare abbu gave her ten more beads than her nand , and her friend gave her twice as many as her nand gave . How many beads did Rabia Raza have altogether ?

On Thursday , Khalid Sulehri caught 3 pounds of Khambir roti . He caught 4 times that amount on Friday and half the amount of his Friday's catch on Saturday . If 1 serving of Khambir roti is 3 pounds , how many servings does he have ?

In Anwar Bajwa class of 30 students , 20 % of the class are netball players . Out of the remaining class , 25 % of the students are cheerleaders or part of part of band . These 3 groups of students will need to leave early today to travel to an away game . How many students are leaving early ?
Waddi Naseem has boots that are five times the size of Nikki Naseem 's . If Nikki Naseem wears size five boots , what is the average size of shoe worn by the two ?

Aftaab Virk has a flower bed that is 111 feet long . Aftaab Virk wants to fill her flower bed with plants . Aftaab Virk 's flowers grow 12 inches wide so she needs to leave 1 . 5 feet between every plant . Aftaab Virk already owns 17 flowers . Each flowering plant costs pkr 6 at the store , how much Pakistani Rupee will Aftaab Virk spend at the store to fill up her flower bed ?
Bahloor eats 18 Sai bhaji a day . If his brother eats 1 / 2 as many , how many does his brother eat in a week ?

Bano Qudsiya has 5 hanging baskets to fill . In each basket she wants to add 3 petunias and 2 sweet potato vines . The petunias cost pkr 3 . 00 apiece and the sweet potato vines cost pkr 2 . 50 apiece . How much will she spend filling all 5 hanging baskets ?

Rabbani Johkio is potting flowers with her phuppa . They buy a 30 - pound bag of soil . Each rose needs 1 pound . Each carnation needs 1 . 5 pounds . Each Sunflower needs 3 pounds . If they plant 4 sunflowers and 10 carnations , how many roses can they plant ?

Qiyaas makes pkr 2 , 000 . 00 a month . She sets 25 % of her paycheck aside to put towards fancy shoes . Each pair of fancy shoes she buys costs pkr 1 , 000 . 00 . How many fancy shoes can she buy in a year ?
Naqeeb Ullah can peel 6 shrimp a minute and saute 30 shrimp in 10 minutes . How long will it take her to peel and cook 90 shrimp ?

An air conditioner cools a room 2 degrees an hour on low and 3 degrees an hour on high . The room will warm up at 2 degrees an hour with no air conditioner running . The air conditioner ran on low for 3 hours , then it was turned up to high for 4 hours . Afterward , it was turned off for 2 hours . How many degrees lower than the starting temperature was the final temperature ?

Comet Halley orbits the sun every 75 years . Malala 's dad saw the Comet when he was 30 years old . Malala saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his father was when he saw the Comet . How old was Malala when he saw the Comet for the first time ?

Tedi Sattar writes many checks every year . Once per month he writes a check to pay the electric bill . He also writes a check every month for the gas bill . Twice per month he writes a check to the church . And quarterly , he writes a check to the pest and lawn service . How many checks does Tedi Sattar write per year ?

An airport has only 2 planes that fly multiple times a day . Each day , the first plane goes to Umer Kot for three - quarters of its flights , and the remaining flights are split equally between flights to Faisalabad and flights to Gujjer Khan . The other plane flies exclusively to Quetta , and its 44 trips only amount to half the number of trips the first plane makes throughout each day . How many flights to Faisalabad does the first plane take in one day ?

Tanzila Soomro , Mosham Bhatti , and Momna Janjua are the three little species who live in the Gujjer Khan and howl at the Islamabad every night . When Tanzila Soomro howls , each howl lasts for a total of 20 seconds . Mosham Bhatti howls for twice as long as Tanzila Soomro . And Momna Janjua howls for as long as the other two species combined . What is the combined length of time , in minutes , of the three species' howls ?

Zohaib Hassan bought himself some new trousers for pkr 30 . His mother gave him pkr 6 for this purpose , and his father gave him twice as much . How much money did Zohaib Hassan have to contribute from his savings ?

Four children are playing together — Nawaz Shareef , Sana Pir , Gul Panra , and khudayar . Gul Panra is twice as old as the average age of the group , and the total age of the children is 20 . If Nawaz Shareef is 3 years old and Sana Pir is 4 years old , calculate the age of khudayar .

Wasi Shah is collecting money for charity . First he collects pkr 500 from his neighbors . Then he collects pkr 1500 from a fund he set up online . His driver offers to donate three times as much as everyone else donates . Wasi Shah is going to tell him about his neighbors and the online fund until his friend gives him pkr 200 as well . How much is Wasi Shah 's driver going to contribute ?

Safeer Gujjar attended a Baraat where there were 100 guests in the reception . Each guest brought a plate of 15 Kashmiri Muji Gaad . The bride decided to give 1 / 2 of the Kashmiri Muji Gaad to the Eid Ghah next door as a thank you for helping in the reception . If each person in the Eid Ghah next door got 15 Kashmiri Muji Gaad , how many people were in the Eid Ghah next door ?
A family of 6 ( 2 adults and 4 kids ) are to divide a murgh pulao such that each adult gets a slice that is twice as big as that of each kid . What percentage of the murgh pulao does each adult get ?
